subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Not even Alfonso Soriano’s arrival could save C. C. Sabathia, who has allowed 17 earned runs in his last 14 innings, and the Yankees, who were shut down by Jeremy Hellickson.
snippet: Not even Alfonso Soriano’s arrival could save C. C. Sabathia, who has allowed 17 earned runs in his last 14 innings, and the Yankees, who were shut down by Jeremy Hellickson.
